        public void loadLastSearch(java.lang.String string)
        Reads the XML file and creates objects for each respective element. Adds these objects to lists that are displayed in GUI
        Parameters:
        string - the type of element to load from XML

      • write

        Parameters:

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String s)
        Deletes one account element according to the parameter type it receives. Useful when logging out of an account.
        Parameters:
        s - String to determine which element to delete

      • clearResults

        public void clearResults(java.lang.String s)
        Removes all elements of the specified type in its parameter. Does not work with login requests.
        Parameters:
        s - the type of elements to be cleared
